Name: Cold Steel Sickle
Description: Cold Steel Sickle General Category Sickles Tech Tier Tier 3 Required Level 20 Description A sturdy Sickle crafted using Cold Steel, unique to Icarus. Plants harvested with this sickle will take more time to spoil. Flavor Text One of the few tools that are only available on Icarus, due to the nature of the materials required. Statistics Attributes +15% chance to cause Freeze on Hit with Attacks +30% Chance to apply the Chilled Modifier Melee Damage 27 - 30 Element Damage 30 Frost Damage Reaping +175% Yield from Reaping Plants Weight 0.5 Kg Durability 150,000 Misc Crafted At Forge Foundry Repaired with 1 Cold Steel Ingot Prerequisite Forge
